hopobject.name: Beada Frame
hopobject.pname: 7" TFT LCD Frame + Touch for BeagleBoard
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; zh-CN; rv:1.9.2.17) Gecko/20110420 Firefox/3.6.17
hopobject.body: This project includes the Hardware Design and Implementation as well as the software needed to the boot loader, Wince and Linux kernel to support the hardware.
hopobject.shortdesc: The project will provide a 7" TFT LCD Screen with a resistive touch screen for BeagleBoard. A plastic(ABS) frame will be included also to contain the screen and touch for easy mounting.
